sentences.en: Although rejected in favour of an anodyne text, this idea was significant.
sentences.cn: 虽然这个想法最终被拒绝,并代之以缓和矛盾的折衷版本, 但其意味非浅.

sentences.en: At the time, I thought that passage was pretty anodyne ( Conor Cruise O'Brien )
sentences.cn: 那时, 我认为那篇文章相当乏味 ( 康纳克鲁斯奥布赖恩 )

sentences.en: Does anodyne feed much meeting do 5 meetings have good mate action to wear?
sentences.cn: 止痛药食多会五会有好大副作用架?

sentences.en: Does dysmenorrhoea eat anodyne what to side effect have to the body? Is opposite Yo influential?
sentences.cn: 痛经吃止痛药对身体有什么副作用 吗 ?对生育有影响 吗 ?

sentences.en: Eat anodyne what to side effect there is?
sentences.cn: 吃止痛药有什么副作用?

sentences.en: Have favorable local anaesthesia effect, use as anodyne.
sentences.cn: 有良好的局部麻醉作用, 用作镇痛剂.

sentences.en: He took some anodyne to relieve the pain.
sentences.cn: 他吃了些止痛药来缓解疼痛.

sentences.en: It was their delight, their folly, their anodyne, their intellectual stimulant.
sentences.cn: 这是他们的人生乐趣, 他们的一时荒唐, 他们的止痛药, 他们的脑力刺激剂.

sentences.en: Many of them read the Financial Times and seem to to anodyne things written by me.
sentences.cn: 他们当中有许多人阅读英国《金融时报》,且似乎对我写的消遣类文章感到不满.

sentences.en: Their quarterly meetings were anodyne affairs.
sentences.cn: 他们的季度会议乏善可陈。

words.tran_cn: [药]止痛的；安慰人的；平淡无奇的
[药]止痛剂；起安慰作用的事物

trans.tran_cn: 止痛的，镇痛的，不会冒犯任何人的，四平八稳的
